oak.widget

Class SwankyImageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.widget.ImageView
        • oak.widget.SwankyImageView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class SwankyImageView
extends android.widget.ImageView
    An ImageView that supports pinch-to-zoom, double-tap-to-zoom, and swipe panning.

    Usage: - Set image source via android:src, setImageBitmap(), or setImageResource() - Supports scale type of CENTER_CROP (default) and CENTER_INSIDE - Default maximum zoom scale is 2.5x

    Author:
    Nate Vogt Based loosely on TouchImageView by Michael Ortiz
